author: Jonathan Swan, Zachary Basu
title: How Ukraine’s president felt about Biden's Russia sanctions speech
description: A source close to the Ukrainian president branded the sanctions Biden announced Tuesday "a powerful first step."
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky sees President Biden's announcement of tougher sanctions against Russia as "a powerful first step" though he's not starry-eyed about them changing Vladimir Puti… [+3992 chars]
